channel.title: Givemod?742
channel.description: how i give mod and admin to a 742 server??? pla help i use source rune-evo THANKS

item.title: Givemod?742
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

OPTION 1
Go into commands.java and add this command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("setrights") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("OWNERS NAME HERE")) { String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1); Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username); if (other == null) return true; other.setRights(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); return true; }

OPTION 2
or go into player.java and search for this:

Logger.log(this, "Inited Player: " + username + ", pass: " + password);

right under that add this:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERS NAME HERE")) { rights = 2; }

2 would be admin or change to 1 for mod.

sorry if this doesn’t help, I’m pretty new to the 718+ experience myself.

Read full topic
